text:
Dear Dr. [redacted_name],
This is [redacted_name], Editorial Manager at Vide Leaf, an eBook publication platform.
I came across your publication "Escherichia coli Nissle 1917 Protects against Sepsis-Induced Intestinal Damage by Regulating the SCFA/GPRs Signaling Pathway" published in "Microorganisms" and would like to discuss the possibility of republishing it as a book chapter in our open access eBook " Prime Archives in Microbiology: 3rd Edition" edited by "Dr. Aalaa Mahgoub Albasha”.
The copyright License of the journal in which the article was published permits for such republication by crediting the original source.
trans:
친애하는 [redacted_name] 박사님께,
저는 eBook 출판 플랫폼인 Vide Leaf의 편집 매니저, [redacted_name]입니다.
귀하께서 "Microorganisms" 저널에 게재하신 논문 "Escherichia coli Nissle 1917 Protects against Sepsis-Induced Intestinal Damage by Regulating the SCFA/GPRs Signaling Pathway"을 접하게 되었으며, 이를 "Dr. Aalaa Mahgoub Albasha"이 편집한 오픈 액세스 eBook "Prime Archives in Microbiology: 3rd Edition" 의 책 챕터로 재출판할 가능성에 대해 논의하고 싶습니다.
해당 논문이 게재된 저널의 저작권 라이선스는 원 출처를 명시하는 조건으로 이러한 재출판을 허용하고 있습니다.
